Class RabbitHole

java.lang.Object
animals.nests.AnimalNest
animals.nests.RabbitHole
All Implemented Interfaces:
itumulator.executable.DynamicDisplayInformationProvider, itumulator.simulator.Actor, itumulator.world.NonBlocking
public class RabbitHole extends AnimalNest implements itumulator.simulator.Actor
Represents a rabbit hole in the simulation world. A `RabbitHole` acts as a shelter for rabbits and can connect to other rabbit holes, forming a network of tunnels. Over time, rabbit holes can collapse, forcing rabbits to relocate to other connected holes.

      location - The location of the hole in the world.
      connectedHoles - The list of rabbit holes to connect to this hole.

    • act

      public void act(itumulator.world.World world)
      Simulates the rabbit hole's behavior in the world during each simulation step. Tracks the time until the rabbit hole collapses and triggers the collapse if necessary.
      Specified by:
      act in interface itumulator.simulator.Actor
      Parameters:
      world - The simulation world.

    • collapse

      private void collapse(itumulator.world.World world)
      Collapses the rabbit hole, forcing rabbits to relocate to another connected hole. If other rabbit holes are available in the network, rabbits are randomly assigned to one of the remaining connected holes. The collapsed hole is removed from the world and the network of connected holes.
      Parameters:
      world - The simulation world.
